text: 17:17 2 Tesalonika 2:11; Akar Mogomem 10:7God uabɨ me ganɨngizir nɨghnɨzir kam, a me damutɨ biziba otivam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ me nɨghnɨzir vamɨra ikɨ, egh atrivimɨn ikiamin gavgaviba bar da isɨ asɨzir atiam danɨngam. Me kamaghɨn damu mangɨtɨ Godɨn akam mɨkemezir biziba, da guizɨn otivamin dughiam otogham.
